div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1586 Saida (anc. Sidon), Phoenicia, 1949 Burial: after 246 B.C. (M) Contents: 38 AR Ptolemy I: 4 tetradr. (Alexandreia as Svo- ronos 205, 252, 256, 265) Ptolemy II: 18 tetradr. (Alexandreia 6 as Sv. 365, 529-31, 544, 548; Tyre 5 as Sv. 637, 644, 658-9, 670; Sidon 3 as Sv. 713, 733, 736; Ace 2 as Sv. 770, 780; Ephesus 2 as Sv. 904-5) Ptolemy III: 2 tetradr. (Alexandreia 1 as Sv. 1001; Joppa 1 as Sv. 1041) Unc. kings: 5 tetradr. (Alexandreia 2; Tyre 2; Joppa? 1) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press) (2 tetradr. of Ptolemy I with ctmks.)
